content: this crochet hat pattern is simple cozy and perfect for anyone this listing is for digital patterns only do not expect a physical product this pattern is written in standard us terms to ensure easy-to-read and follow directions plus accuracy all my patterns are tested by experienced pattern testers and tech-edited be the first to know about new pattern releases sales and giveaways subscribe to my email list the pdf is designed for printing this way you can support my small business **skill level** easy **materials** lion brand basic stitch anti-pilling 100% acrylic 185 yds 170 m 3 5 oz 100 g in purple hook 4 5 mm tapestry needle scissors tape measure **finished sizes** toddler child small medium large
